missionStatement.title: Where Music Comes To Life
missionStatement.paragraph: Area Twenty-Two is a one stop shop for all music-maker needs, whether aspiring beginner or tried-and-tested veteran. Artists of all skill levels can refine their knowledge, technique, and approach with the help of our dedicated team of professionals. Musicians and producers across the gamut of content-creation can reap the benefits of our commercial recording studio - a comfortable and efficient recording environment. With musical awareness and technical know-how, Area Twenty-Two brings music to life.
